import{IonSlide,IonSlides}from'@ionic/react';import React from'react';import{useResource}from'rest-hooks';import PostResource from'../../resources/post';import PostCard from'./PostCard';// Optional parameters to pass to the swiper instance. See http://idangero.us/swiper/api/ for valid options.
var slideOpts={slidesPerView:2};var News=function News(){var posts=useResource(PostResource.listShape(),{limit:10});return React.createElement(IonSlides,{pager:posts.length>2,options:slideOpts},posts.map(function(post){return React.createElement(IonSlide,{key:post.id},React.createElement(PostCard,{post:post}));}));};export default News;
